## Ingredients

* 2 cups sugar
* 2/3 cup cocoa powder
* 1 cup butter, melted
* 4 large eggs
* 2 tsp vanilla
* 1 1/2 cup flour
* 2/3 cup chocolate chips

## Directions

* Grease a 9 x 13 pan.
* Preheat oven to 350 F.
* Mix **2 cups** sugar and **2/3 cup** cocoa powder.
* Mix in **1 cup** melted butter, **4** large eggs, **2 tsp** vanilla.
* Add **1 1/2 cups** flour and mix until just combined.
* Fold in **2/3 cup** chocolate chips.
* Drop into greased 9 x 13 pan.
* Bake at 350 F for 32 minutes.

Source: https://handletheheat.com/rocky-road-brownies/
